description: In a followup to a tentative ruling made in December, a federal judge has ordered Elon Musk to comply with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's (SEC) subpoena and testify again in its probe of his Twitter takeover, Reuters reports. Per the order, which was filed Saturday night in a California court, Musk and the SEC now have a week to work out a time and place for his appearance or it will be decided for them. The SEC has been investigating Musk‚Äôs purchase of Twitter, now X, since 2022 over concerns
title: Court orders Elon Musk to testify in the SEC‚Äôs investigation of his Twitter takeover
